entry.title: Monday night: Chance of drizzle or rain. Low plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending early this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle or showers. Risk of a thundershower early this evening. Fog patches developing early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming east 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 12. POP 30%
